subject: Order Number #SSN1885
description_text:
Hi,

I recently received the pedal set which looks fantastic.

I ordered this with the base plate and the haptic reactors.

[image: image.png]


I never actually received the haptic reactors for the pedals. I presume
there should be one for each pedal and they attach to the back of the
pedal? These were not contained in the shipment I received.

Kind Regards,
R Jones

conversations.body_text: Hi Richard Jones,  I checked your order #1885 and noticed that it doesn’t include a VAM or VAM Pro motor. These motors need to be purchased separately. I’ll provide you with the purchase link.       https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-vam-pedals-haptic-reactor?variant=51351053500730

Hi,

Thanks for the reply, and thanks for the link. I thought this was part of
the order but I did not order these separately.

What does it mean on my order below - 'with Haptic reactor x '  (what is
this haptic reactor)

[image: image.png]

Kind Regards,
Richard ?




On Mon, 7 Jul 2025 at 05:04, service@simsonn.com
